experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Juego Studios
workDescription: Supervised and mentored junior team members to achieve high performance and meet goals.
Spearheaded the optimization of existing web games and frontend apps resulting in a 20% - 30% reduction in page load times and a more seamless user experience in low end devices.

experiences.title: Software Engineer II
experiences.subtitle: Juego Studios
workDescription: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement and enhance features, ensuring a cohesive and user-friendly product.
Implemented various frontend solutions such as an NFT Marketplace, Admin Portal, and others using React, Redux, Material UI and other frontend tools.
Demonstrated expertise in blockchain smart contract development, successfully deploying and managing smart contracts on major blockchain platforms.

workDescription: Played a key role in the development of web games, contributing to the implementation of core features and functionalities.
